name: Hold Your Ground !
description:
Your are stuck in the middle of a hord of goblins!

you need to hold your ground but you got cursed and your weapon will keep changing

every random amount of time your weapon will switch

press space while in sword mode to melee kill

press space to shoot arrow in archer mode

while in shield mode you can push the enemies into the edge to kill them

sorry for any weird glitches its my first game in Unity
